```ts
// @public (undocumented)
export interface NotFoundError {
    // (undocumented)
    ["errors"]?: Array<ErrorItem>;
    // (undocumented)
    ["message"]?: string;
}

// @public (undocumented)
export interface PaymentStatusesGetResponseBody {
    // (undocumented)
    ["additions"]?: {
        [key: string]: string;
    };
    // (undocumented)
    ["paymentStatuses"]?: Array<string>;
}

// @public (undocumented)
export interface PaymentTypesGetResponseBody {
    // (undocumented)
    ["additions"]?: {
        [key: string]: string;
    };
    // (undocumented)
    ["paymentTypes"]?: Array<string>;
}

// @public (undocumented)
export interface PostActionRecipesRequestParams {
    // (undocumented)
    ["actionRecipesPostRequestBody"]?: ActionRecipesPostRequestBody;
}

// @public (undocumented)
export interface PostActivationRequestRequestParams {
    // (undocumented)
    ["recipeId"]: string;
}

// @public (undocumented)
export interface PostDeactivationRequestRequestParams {
    // (undocumented)
    ["recipeId"]: string;
}

// @public (undocumented)
export interface PutActionRecipeRequestParams {
    // (undocumented)
    ["actionRecipePutRequestBody"]?: ActionRecipePutRequestBody;
    // (undocumented)
    ["recipeId"]: string;
}

// @public (undocumented)
export interface PutBatchProcessingRequestParams {
    // (undocumented)
    ["batchProcessingPutRequestBody"]?: BatchProcessingPutRequestBody;
}

// @public (undocumented)
export interface Recurrence {
    // (undocumented)
    ["additions"]?: {
        [key: string]: string;
    };
    // (undocumented)
    ["daysOfWeek"]?: Array<DaysOfWeek>;
    // (undocumented)
    ["hoursOfDay"]?: Array<HoursOfDay>;
    // (undocumented)
    ["quartzExpression"]?: string;
}

// @public (undocumented)
export interface Route {
    // (undocumented)
    ["dataTemplate"]?: string;
    // (undocumented)
    ["whereTo"]?: string;
}

// @public (undocumented)
export interface SpecificationAction {
    // (undocumented)
    ["additions"]?: {
        [key: string]: string;
    };
    // (undocumented)
    ["route"]?: Route;
    // (undocumented)
    ["severityLevel"]?: string;
    // (undocumented)
    ["templates"]?: Array<EngagementJourneyTemplate>;
    // (undocumented)
    ["type"]: string;
}

// @public (undocumented)
export type TemplateType = 'REGULAR' | 'DIGEST';

// @public (undocumented)
export const TemplateType: {
    REGULAR: TemplateType;
    DIGEST: TemplateType;
};

// @public (undocumented)
export interface UnauthorizedError {
    // (undocumented)
    ["errors"]?: Array<ErrorItem>;
    // (undocumented)
    ["message"]?: string;
}

// (No @packageDocumentation comment for this package)

```
